attributes.action: Hold a vote of no confidence in the current Government
attributes.additional_details: We believe the Government has failed to deliver on its promises and is not acting in the best interests of the country. A vote of no confidence would allow Parliament to decide whether the Government still has its support. If not, the people should be given the chance to choose a new Government.
attributes.background: We want MPs in the House of Commons to hold a vote of no confidence in the current Government. If the Government loses the vote, this should lead to a general election so the public can decide who governs.

rejection.details:
Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309

Give the British Public the Right to Vote No Confidence in the Government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734311
